message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.CC, cs.HCI. 

The paper investigates the emotions people feel when following a suggestion by an intelligent machine that has a wrong outcome, which is a topic related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The study also touches on the potential distrust that could affect the long-term use of the system and the cooperation, which could fall under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CY) and computer communication (cs.CC). Finally, the paper presents implications for the study of decision making with intelligent machines, which is a topic related to human-computer interaction (cs.HCI).
